name: DrawerHeader
desc: The top-most region of a Material Design drawer. The header's [child] widget, if any, is placed inside a [Container] whose [decoration] can be passed as an argument, inset by the given [padding].

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: Decoration for the main drawer header [Container]; useful for applying backgrounds.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding by which to inset [child].

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: The margin around the drawer header.

fields.name: duration
fields.desc: The duration for animations of the [decoration].

fields.name: curve
fields.desc: The curve for animations of the [decoration].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: A widget to be placed inside the drawer header, inset by the [padding].
